_description: On sloth — two short couplets translating, ‘Ad lettum gressum tardat piger in huic qȝ recessum’ which follows

BodDou52.Transcription:
lothe to bedde & lothe fro beddeme schall know þe
                    flow

RylandsLat394.Transcription:
Loth to bedde and loth fro beddeAnd so þe slowesone me
                    shall knowe
RylandsLat394.Note: Written 2 lines text per line of MS.
RylandsLat394.Editions:
Pantin,  William A. 
             “A Medieval Collection of Latin and English Proverbs…from Rylands
                Latin MS. 394.” 
             Bulletin of the John Rylands Library
         14 (1930): 81-114: 99.
